titleStmt.title: Petrarchs seuen penitentiall psalmes paraphrastically translated: with other philosophicall poems, and a hymne to Christ vpon the crosse. Written by George Chapman
titleStmt.author: Petrarca, Francesco, 1304-1374.
Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by R. Field] for Matthevv Selman, dwelling in Fleete-streete neare Chancerie lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
